concept.title: Building EAR files
concept.shortdesc: The main step before deployment of an application is to package it into enterprise archive (.ear) files. The application (web client, server) and web services application are all packaged into separate .ear files.

conbody.p: The Server Development Environment for (SDEJ) provides Apache Ant targets for packaging .ear files.
Before running build targets in the following section, you must set WLS_HOME environment variable, and the previously set environment variables, see Installing a development environment.
The WLS_HOME variable should point to the server directory of the installation, for example: d:\weblogic\server or /opt/weblogic/server.
